title: RIOT CHAT RESTRICT  ME PLS!!
body: Can someone at Rito chat restrict me so I cant type, yall know the reason. That is all.

replies.body: Just unbind your enter key so you cant open the chat.
yeah but I think the whole point of what he's asking is so he has no control over it, because in the moment the game may be so heated that OP will bind his chat key to flame and regret it after

You need to teach yourself to not type in anger buddy. You can be chat-restricted for 100 games and it still wouldn't help because sooner or later, that kettle is going to burst pretty much as if you're suppressing your anger until the restrictions off. It's just a game mate, relax.
LMAO, I can quit smoking after 20 years, but you can't quit bitching in LoL?
